MESSAGE.name: BitonalToDjVu.bad_matching_level
MESSAGE.value: [%0!05d!] matching-level must be between 0 and 100 inclusively.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuJB2Parse.bad_dict
MESSAGE.value: [%0!05d!] Pages per dictionary should be greater than zero

MESSAGE.name: DjVuJB2Parse.bad_matching_level
MESSAGE.value: [%0!05d!] Matching level must be between 0 and 100

MESSAGE.name: DjVuJB2Parse.bad_max_density
MESSAGE.value: [%0!05d!] Max density must be between 0 and 100

MESSAGE.name: --invert
MESSAGE.value: %1!s! If bitonal, swap black and white.

MESSAGE.name: --pages-per-dict
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=<value> Number of pages per shared dictionary (default 10).

MESSAGE.name: --pseudo
MESSAGE.value: %1!s! Output pseudo DjVu. Input files must be TIFF G4.

MESSAGE.name: --max-density
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=<0-100> Component density above which JB1 (not JB2) encoding used to speed-up compression of watermarked or dithered images (default 75).
